meanings.definition: In a manner relating to a contract.
meanings.sent1: She agreed to work for the company contractually.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly said he would only eat lunch contractually.

meanings.definition: In a way that is legally binding through a contract.
meanings.sent1: They were contractually obligated to pay rent on time.
meanings.sent2: The terms were contractually agreed upon.
meanings.sent3: She promised to only wear blue on Fridays contractually.
